name: .FW
summary: Learn about .FW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: Most FW files are not meant to be manually opened. To install an FW file on a device, refer to that device's user manual or the instructions included with the file.
If you are an advanced user who wants to analyze the data an FW file contains, you can do so using Binwalk (multiplatform).
